lead_paragraph: OLNICK--Sylvia Nadel, passed away peacefully on May 31, 2016 in her 97th year. Beloved and cherished wife of the late Robert S. Olnick, treasured mother of Barbara Lane and Nancy Olnick, adored mother-in-law of Richard Lane and Giorgio Spanu, grandmother of Allison Lane Rubler, Meredith Lane Verona, Eve Margot Lateiner, Robert Olnick Lateiner and Stella Olnick Spanu. Proud great-grandmother of six: Madeleine and Olivia Rubler, Avery, Morgan, Quinn and Dean Verona. Loving aunt of Tobette Feinberg. A graduate of New York University, she was an active supporter of many Jewish charities in New York, Palm Beach and Israel. A dear soul, blessed with beauty, grace and elegance. She was a wonderful woman, wife, mother, grandparent and great-grand- parent. Her loving and comforting nature was a blessing to all who knew her. Her commitment to Jewish life and family was an inspiration and her love made each of us better. We miss her terribly... 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  OLNICK, SYLVIA NADEL
